```js
class DatePickerExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { date: null };
    this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this);
  }

  onChange(date) {
    this.setState({ date });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <DatePicker
        date={this.state.date}
        onChange={this.onChange}
        label="Select a date"
      />
    );
  }
}

<DatePickerExample />;
```
